item.super_item.super_item.tip2: Offhand: While in your hand, you are invulnerable
item.super_item.super_item.tip4: Offhand: Sneak + right-click full absorption hearts
item.super_item.super_item.tip6: Mainhand: Sneak + right-click gives Night Vision
item.super_item.super_item.tip7: Either hand: Right click on a block to place a torch
